mapper.select: select apc.code, apc.code_explain, bcc.* from board_classification_code bcc left outer join board_article_classifiction_map bacm on bacm.board_classification_code = bcc.classification_code left outer join article_preface_code apc on apc.code = bacm.article_preface_code where bcc.classification_text = #{classificationText} order by apc.order asc

select b.board_id, b.title, b.writer, b.reg_date, b.views, b.recommendations, apc.code, apc.code_explain from board b inner join board_classification_code bcc on b.classification_code = bcc.classification_code left join article_preface_code apc on b.preface_code = apc.code where bcc.classification_text = #{classificationText} and b.is_del='N' order by board_id desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageBoardNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board a INNER JOIN board_classification_code b ON a.classification_code = b.classification_code AND b.classification_text=#{classificationText}

SELECT b.board_id, b.title, b.contents, b.writer, b.reg_date, b.views, b.recommendations, apc.code_explain, bt.tag_id, bt.tag FROM board b INNER JOIN board_classification_code bcc ON b.classification_code = bcc.classification_code LEFT JOIN article_preface_code apc ON b.preface_code = apc.code LEFT JOIN board_tag_map btm ON b.board_id=btm.board_id LEFT JOIN board_tag bt ON btm.tag_id=bt.tag_id WHERE bcc.classification_text = #{boardType} AND b.is_del = 'N' AND b.board_id=#{boardId}
SELECT UUID,upload_path,original_file,file_type FROM board_file WHERE board_id=#{boardId}
mapper.insert: insert into board ( classification_code, preface_code, title, contents, writer, reg_date, is_public, permit_reply )VALUES( #{boardVO.classificationCode}, #{boardVO.preface.code}, #{boardVO.title}, #{boardVO.contents}, #{boardVO.writer}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(), #{boardVO.isPublic}, #{boardVO.permitReply} )
insert into board_tag (tag) values (#{tag}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE tagging_cnt = tagging_cnt + 1;
INSERT INTO board_file ( uuid, board_id, upload_path, original_file, file_size, file_type, upload_date )VALUES( #{uuid}, #{boardId}, #{uploadPath}, #{originalFile}, #{fileSize}, #{fileType}, NOW() )
